remarks: Elements of the free module are finitely supported.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 3-Feb-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ frlmbasfsupp as of 11-Jul-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
frlmval.f $e |- F = ( R freeLMod I ) $.
frlmbasfsupp.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
frlmbasfsupp.b $e |- B = ( Base ` F ) $.
frlmbassup $p |- ( ( I e. W /\ X e. B ) -> ( `' X " ( _V \ { .0. } ) ) e. Fin ) $.
